Message.Msg: One of many, many hidden taxes. This one has been around for over 25 years and keeps growing e.g., expanding the universal service definition to include cellular service some 5 yrs ago or so. WASHINGTON CALLING: SEND MORE MONEY (We'll "hide" it so the pain is less obvious)
I feel sorry for the president. If he gets re-elected, think of the mess he's going to inherit!
